Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the interior is slightly grooved and partially covered with a yellow/off-white granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and faint traces of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Prof Walter B Emery
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393746) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393746)
